name: Boulder Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Pewter City Gym. Symbolizes strength and determination.

name: Cascade Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Cerulean City Gym. Symbolizes mastery of Water-type Pokémon.

name: Thunder Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Vermilion City Gym. Symbolizes mastery of Electric-type Pokémon.

name: Rainbow Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Celadon City Gym. Symbolizes harmony with nature and Grass-type Pokémon.

name: Soul Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Fuchsia City Gym. Symbolizes discipline and mastery of Poison-type Pokémon.

name: Marsh Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Saffron City Gym. Symbolizes psychic power and mental strength.

name: Volcano Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Cinnabar Island Gym. Symbolizes fiery passion and mastery of Fire-type Pokémon.

name: Earth Badge
meaning: Awarded for defeating the Viridian City Gym. Symbolizes mastery of Ground-type Pokémon and completion of the Gym challenge.

name: Community Helper
meaning: Awarded for helping other trainers in the Discord server.

name: Event Champion
meaning: Awarded for winning a special Discord event or tournament.

name: Early Supporter
meaning: Awarded to trainers who joined the Discord server in its first month.

name: Bug Catcher
meaning: Awarded for reporting a bug that helped improve the bot or server.

name: Server Booster
meaning: Awarded for boosting the Discord server.

name: Pokédex Master
meaning: Awarded for completing the Pokédex on this Discord server.

name: Top Trader
meaning: Awarded for making 10 successful trades with other trainers.

name: Contest Star
meaning: Awarded for participating in 5 or more community contests.

name: Friendly Rival
meaning: Awarded for battling with friends 20 times.

name: Welcome Wagon
meaning: Awarded for greeting and welcoming 10 new trainers to the server.

name: Trivia Ace
meaning: Awarded for winning a server Pokémon trivia game.

name: Artisan
meaning: Awarded for sharing Pokémon-themed art or creative work in the community.

name: Streamer Supporter
meaning: Awarded for supporting or promoting a community stream or event.

name: Kind Heart
meaning: Awarded for acts of kindness or generosity in the community.
